title: Flight Simulator 2020 - POI's - Italy - Santissima Trinita Di Saccargia
description:
In this video we will fly over the Santissima Trinita Di Saccargia. The Basilica della Santissima TrinitÃ  di Saccargia is a church in the comune of Codrongianos, northern Sardinia, Italy. It is one of the most important Romanesque site in the island. The construction is entirely in local stone (black basalt and white limestone), with a typical appearance of Tuscan Romanesque style.
